messages.title: The choice at this election
messages.content: 5 more years of Gordon Brown’s tired government making things worse or David Cameron and the Conservatives with the energy, leadership and values to get the country moving.

messages.title: We can't go on like this. Vote for change and:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Back aspiration and opportunity for all. Cut the deficit, keep mortgage rates low and get the economy moving.
Mend our broken society by encouraging responsibility and backing those who do the right thing.
Give people more power and control. Sort out the mess of MPs’ expenses, cut Parliament, Whitehall and the cost of politics. Make politics more local, more transparent, more accountable.

issues.brexitEurope: Make Britain the most family-friendly country in Europe.
issues.economy: Cut the deficit, keep mortgage rates low and get the economy moving.
issues.education: Reform education, with new schools – and standards and discipline for all.
issues.governance: Sort out the mess of MPs’ expenses, cut Parliament, Whitehall and the cost of politics. Make politics more local, more transparent, more accountable.
issues.health: Back the NHS, which matters more to families than anything.
issues.socialWelfare: Tackle welfare dependency and the causes of poverty.
